p: Hyalohyphomycosis was concluded. The serum galactomannan was negative. Pulmonary involvement was not seen by tomography. The antifungal treatment was changed from caspofungin to intravenous Voriconazole on day 23. The patient had gradual clinical improvement the neutropenia was remitted and was discharged with a treatment of oral voriconazole 200 mg bid. He was, at that time, in complete remission of leukemia.
